properties.name: producer.user
properties.description: User to authenticate at the resident registration system

properties.name: producer.password
properties.description: Password to authenticate at the resident registration system

properties.name: ewo.eai.url
properties.description: Technical address (url) for the residents' registration system

properties.name: api.auth.users
properties.description: Authentication (user, password and roles) on this EAI

properties.name: api.cxf.producer.uri.personeninfoewosuche
properties.description: CXF-Bean used for calling the residents' registration system. Used for searching a citizen

properties.name: api.cxf.producer.uri.personeninfo
properties.description: CXF-Bean used for calling the residents' registration system. Used for retrieving a specific citizen by the id

properties.name: api.cxf.producer.timeout
properties.description: Timeout for the CXF-Bean used for calling the residents' registration system

properties.name: api.auth.roles.BASIC
properties.description: Necessary role for calling the residents' registration system

properties.name: api.loggingFilter.urlPattern
properties.description: Pattern used to filter url for calling request- and responselogger

properties.name: api.loggingFilter.charsetName
properties.description: Character set of request- and responselogger

properties.name: service.rest.basepath
properties.description: The base path for calling this service (EAI)
